survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Shopping Assistant Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction with AI-powered personal shopping assistants, focusing on usability, accuracy, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered personal shopping assistant do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unspecified assistants.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered personal shopping assistant do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations provided by your AI shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations provided by your AI shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: What types of products do you typically use your AI shopping assistant for? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse usage patterns.

script.question_text: What types of products do you typically use your AI shopping assistant for? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of use of your AI shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure ease of use.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of use of your AI shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in your AI shopping assistant? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in your AI shopping assistant? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with your AI shopping assistant? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will help identify common pain points.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with your AI shopping assistant? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI shopping assistant to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure net promoter score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI shopping assistant to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your AI shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will gather qualitative feedback for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your AI shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: How important is privacy when using an AI shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure the importance of privacy.

script.question_text: How important is privacy when using an AI shopping assistant?
